participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative, adventurous, and driven to capture the beauty of the world.
participant_2.background: I want to put my photos to a music video starring Adam Levine. I want to travel the world taking photographs of my travels. I am a widow. I want to be a famous photographer.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2.
It's nice to meet you! What do you do for a living?
I'm a photographer.
That's cool! What kind of photography do you do?
I do a little bit of everything, but I'm most interested in travel photography.
That's awesome! I love travel photography too. What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I'm not sure I could pick just one place, but I really loved Peru.
Peru is amazing! I've always wanted to go there.
You should definitely go! It's one of the most beautiful countries in the world.
I will!
So, what are you up to today?
I'm in between classes right now. I'm studying to be a doctor.
Oh, that's cool! I've always thought about going into medicine, but I'm not sure I have the stomach for it.
It's definitely not for everyone. But it's a lot of fun and it's very rewarding.
That's good to know.
So, what are you working on right now?
I'm working on a photo essay about my travels to Peru.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to see it when it's finished.
You will! I'm hoping to put it together into a book someday.
That would be amazing! I would definitely buy a copy.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just trying to focus on my photography for now.
That's a good idea. Just keep doing what you love and you'll eventually find success.
Thanks! I'm trying
